beaked:MendingPlumage.NAME: Mending Plumage
beaked:MendingPlumage.FLAVOR: The Plumage merges with your feathers and makes you feel ...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon playing a card, heal #b1 HP.

beaked:FlawlessSticks.NAME: Flawless Sticks
beaked:FlawlessSticks.FLAVOR: A bundle of surprisingly beautiful sticks.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yExhaust all #yDepleted cards.

beaked:ShinyBauble.NAME: Shiny Bauble
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with #b1 #yRitual.

beaked:ThroatLozenge.NAME: Throat Lozenge
DESCRIPTIONS: Ignore the first #yWither effect each combat.

beaked:SacredNecklace.NAME: Sacred Necklace
beaked:SacredNecklace.FLAVOR: A sparkling trinket from an exotic land...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn.

beaked:MawFillet.NAME: Maw Fillet
beaked:MawFillet.FLAVOR: The stench attracts the hungriest, repels the wealthiest.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Shops are replaced with Elites.

beaked:BlessedCoat.NAME: Blessed Coat
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #pMending #pPlumage. Every time you play #b2 cards in a single turn, gain #b1 #yRegen.

beaked:RitualPlumage.NAME: Ritual Plumage
DESCRIPTIONS: Ritual and end your turn. This can only be used #ronce per combat.
beaked:RitualPlumage.FLAVOR: The Strength of a Demon courses through you.

beaked:SacrificeDoll.NAME: Sacrifice Doll
DESCRIPTIONS: On the first turn of battle, play your entire hand with random targets at no cost.
beaked:SacrificeDoll.FLAVOR: This doll reminds you of a certain...robot. You feel as if it's always watching over you.
